ne20:4.1: **Arakkhitena cittenā**ti kiṃ desayati, pamādaṃ taṃ maccuno padaṃ.
ne20:4.2: **Micchādiṭṭhihatena cā**ti micchādiṭṭhihataṃ nāma vuccati yadā “anicce niccan”ti passati, so vipallāso.
ne20:4.8: Catūsu attabhāvavatthūsu, rūpaṃ attato samanupassati, rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
ne20:4.12: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati, viññāṇavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, attani vā viññāṇaṃ, viññāṇasmiṃ vā attānaṃ.
ne20:5.3: Saññā saṅkhārā ca tatiyaṃ vipallāsavatthu “anattani attā”ti.
ne20:5.7: Taṇhānivutaṃ cittaṃ dvīhi vipallāsehi vipallāsīyati “asubhe subhan”ti “dukkhe sukhan”ti.
ne20:5.8: Diṭṭhinivutaṃ cittaṃ dvīhi vipallāsehi vipallāsīyati “anicce niccan”ti “anattani attā”ti.
ne20:6.1: Tattha yo diṭṭhivipallāso, so atītaṃ rūpaṃ attato samanupassati,
ne20:6.6: Tattha yo taṇhāvipallāso, so anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandati,
ne20:6.14: Tesaṃ avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ pubbā koṭi na paññāyati sandhāvantānaṃ saṃsarantānaṃ sakiṃ nirayaṃ sakiṃ tiracchānayoniṃ sakiṃ pettivisayaṃ sakiṃ asurakāyaṃ sakiṃ deve sakiṃ manusse.
ne20:7.2: Thinaṃ nāma yā cittassa akallatā akammaniyatā;
ne20:7.4: **Vasaṃ mārassa gacchatī**ti kilesamārassa ca sattamārassa ca vasaṃ gacchati, so hi nivuto saṃsārābhimukho hoti.
ne20:7.5: Imāni bhagavatā dve saccāni desitāni dukkhaṃ samudayo ca.
ne20:7.6: Tesaṃ bhagavā pariññāya ca pahānāya ca dhammaṃ deseti dukkhassa pariññāya samudayassa pahānāya.
ne20:7.7: Yena ca parijānāti yena ca pajahati, ayaṃ maggo.
ne20:7.8: Yaṃ taṇhāya avijjāya ca pahānaṃ, ayaṃ nirodho.
